name: Panipuri
desc: An appetizer served with a green dipping sauce. The crispy balls are first deep-fried, then stuffed with a delicious filling through a hole on the top. The bite-sized snack is a common street food in Sumeru.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

customize.name: Recipe: Panipuri
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Panipuri.

customize.name: Potato
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Spice
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Delicious Panipuri
customize.desc: A delicacy that is served with dipping sauce. The round panipuri balls remind you of Slimes. Anticipate the mysterious, bright-colored juice within, and bring it to your mouth â€” the coolness, sourness, and tingling sensations are bouncing freely on your tongue as if someone has ignited a stick of dreamy dynamite. No wonder that some people in Sumeru are so obsessed with it...

customize.name: Suspicious Panipuri
customize.desc: A delicacy served with dipping sauce. The green sauce gives off a slightly unusual smell, and its color looks a bit off... Maybe it is a good idea to forget about the sauce and directly go for the panipuri balls.
